name: Simple WebSocket Server C++
short_description:
A very simple, fast, multithreaded, platform independent WebSocket (WS) and WebSocket Secure (WSS) server and client library implemented using C++11, Boost.Asio and OpenSSL. Created to be an easy way to make WebSocket endpoints in C++.

See README.md under Files for more information.

git: https://github.com/eidheim/Simple-WebSocket-Server

See also https://sourceforge.net/projects/simplewebservercpp for an easy way to make REST resources available from C++ applications.
summary: An easy way to make WebSocket endpoints in C++.
